edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.examples
Class HandRouter

java.lang.Object
  edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.examples.HandRouter

public class HandRouter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is an example of how to do some simple routing by hand. It is more used a demonstration of how to do real routing with RapidSmith, rather than being a useful way to route.

Author:
Chris Lavin Created on: Jul 15, 2010
